tool_description: Analyzes communication preferences across customer segments to provide insights for marketing strategy and preference optimization.

analysis_type.description: Type of analysis: segment_preferences, channel_adoption, frequency_trends, opt_out_analysis

customer_segment.description: Customer segment to analyze: all, premium, regular, new, inactive

error_messages: Invalid analysis type: analysis_type must be one of: segment_preferences, channel_adoption, frequency_trends, opt_out_analysis.
Invalid customer segment: customer_segment must be one of: all, premium, regular, new, inactive.
Invalid time period: time_period must be one of: 7d, 30d, 90d, 1y.
Insufficient data: Not enough data available for the specified analysis parameters.
usage: Specify analysis_type and optionally filter by customer_segment and time_period. Enable include_benchmarks for comparative analysis.

analysis_summary.description: Summary of key findings from the analysis

metrics.description: Key metrics and statistics in key=value format

recommendations.description: Actionable recommendations based on the analysis
